    Megatron and his followers reached Kitkats shiped, armed and looking 
forward for the fight that lay ahead. Megatron talked into his comm, "Kitkat, 
we are here."
    
    Tarantulas turned to Quickstrike, "Detenators will work...." and then 
mumbled under his breath..."so why dont you go strap one to yourself." And 
then looked around the old ship.
